```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(flexdashboard)
library(tidyverse)
library(plotly)
library(p8105.datasets)
```

```{r}
data("instacart")

num_aisle_insta = 
  instacart |> 
  group_by(aisle) |> 
  summarize(
    n = n() # counts observations for each group
  ) |> 
  arrange(desc(n))
```


Column {data-width=650}
-----------------------------------------------------------------------

### Chart A

```{r}
num_aisle_insta |> 
  filter(n > 10000) |> #keep those with more than 10000 orders
  mutate(aisle = fct_reorder(aisle, n)) |> 
  plot_ly(
    x = ~aisle, y = ~n,
    type = "bar", colors = "viridis"
  ) 
```

Column {data-width=350}
-----------------------------------------------------------------------

### Chart B

```{r}
instacart |> 
  select(order_id, order_hour_of_day) |> 
  distinct(order_id, .keep_all = TRUE) |> 
  plot_ly(
      x = ~order_hour_of_day,
      type = "histogram", colors = "viridis"
    )
```
